content.question: Surface oceanic circulation results most directly in the

choices.label: distribution of heat from tropical to temperate and polar regions
movement of benthic organisms from polar to temperate regions
spring and fall overturn of temperate bodies of water
restriction of the jet stream to polar regions

content.answer: distribution of heat from tropical to temperate and polar regions

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
